title: #supportkarnatakacbse
content: Karnataka, state board had 3 chances to write boards. Best of 3 was taken. Even those who scored 90 and above wrote exam again to get better. Pity the cbse and other boards. What a fu***** education system

comments.body:
They will of course do this to make sure only State Board people get best of best ranks in KCET. After all its 50% of PCM boards right 

Meanwhile us in other boards gonna get screwed eitherway cuz paper level is surely tougher than State Board and add to that this "extra" chances part ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
True lol this year my paper went really badÂ

Oh shit....  
How did your PESSAT go if you wrote it?
it was a bit better  i ended up getting ece in rr campus
Everywhere the board results are considered for eligibility. There too state students will have upper hand
Though it sounds unfair . Im happy it is like that . I dont want to compete with outsiders for college like I compete for property lol.
Just imagine the plight of Karnataka students studying in cbse boards.

Out of curiosity, why did you take cbse?


I too studied cbse till 10th, and switched to state board for this reason.
